rows.label: tev013101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev013101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Dalton about transports.

rows.label: tev013101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev013101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Dalton if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev013101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Dalton for his thoughts on the Ma-non.

rows.label: tev013101_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Dalton for his thoughts on Dagahn.

rows.label: tev013101_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Dalton for his thoughts on Rock.

rows.label: tev013101_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Dalton if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev013101_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Dalton for his opinion on the state of New LA.

rows.label: tev013101_SEL0091
rows.name: Ask Dalton about recent developments.

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Those transports are so convenient! They can take you
from here to the administrative district in the blink of
an eye. It's just like the taxis we had back on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0002
rows.name:
They created transports for BLADEs, since they have to
move around a lot. That's why we civvies don't get to
use them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0003
rows.name:
That's fair enough, I suppose. All we normal folk do is
go back and forth between work, home, and the diner.
Cars are good enough for that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0008
rows.name:
You wanna hear some gossip about my subordinates?
...Ha ha! Don't worry, I wouldn't bore you with that.
But I can't pass up a chance to brag.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0009
rows.name:
Pretty much everyone on the Whale crew is exceptional
in some way, but Bernat and Ryo are a cut above.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Of course, what I REALLY need is someone strong
enough to lift these containers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Ha ha! Kidding! ...No, really. I'm just kidding.
That's what we got the industrial Skells for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0020
rows.name:
The Ma-non have nimble fingers and an incredible
grasp of technology, but their arms got all the muscle
of wet noodles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0021
rows.name:
They don't seem to like manual labor much,
and clearly they prefer lifting pizza to weights.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0022
rows.name:
Next time you're making friends with xenos,
what say you pick a species that's big as a Skell
and twice as strong?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0039
rows.name:
...Dagahn? Is that the Skell-sized xeno everyone says
you put a whuppin' on?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0040
rows.name:
When I said I wanted you to bring over a bigger xeno,
I never imagined you'd take it so seriously! Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0041
rows.name:
Er, but as long as you are, let me clarifyâ€”I'm looking
for a gentle-giant sort of xeno that doesn't want to
destroy the city and everyone in it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0042
rows.name: Is that too much to ask?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0043
rows.name:
Is that the name of the giant xeno who came stomping
into the city recently?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0044
rows.name:
When I said I wanted you to bring over a bigger xeno,
I never imagined you'd take it so seriously! Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0045
rows.name:
Anyway, he certainly looks strong. But that just means
he'll probably end up being drafted by BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0050
rows.name:
Lately, we've been having problems doing large-scale
construction in places where we can't bring our
industrial Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0051
rows.name:
We've had some help from BLADEs using amplification
suits, but it's still a major issue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0052
rows.name:
We've been racking our brains here, but no one's come
up with a good solution yet. Honestly, I don't know
what we're gonna do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0056
rows.name:
The city sure has sprung to life since all these
xenos moved in![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0057
rows.name:
But I imagine we're gonna need to build more places
for 'em all to live, and that kind of housing ain't in the
original construction plans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0058
rows.name:
We could expand the place a little bit if we get rid
of the sea of gel in the lower section of the city,
but otherwise, it ain't gonna be easy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0059
rows.name:
Maybe the Ma-non can help us out with some of their
fancy-pants technology?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0063
rows.name:
Rock's a real hard worker. You gotta thank the director
general for me next time you see him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0064
rows.name:
I was worried Rock wouldn't understand the directions I
was giving him, but that hasn't been a problem at all.
It's nuts how he learned English so quickly![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0065
rows.name: ...Huh? Whaddya mean he doesn't know English?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0066
rows.name:
...Yeah, I don't really understand what you mean by all
that, but so long as we're all able to communicate,
I'm happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0053
rows.name: Rock really seems to be getting into his job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0054
rows.name:
I asked him what he was so happy about,
and he said something about finally being able
to tell his friends the truth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0055
rows.name:
He's really a sweet kid. Simple, but sweet.
Kinda gets me right here, ya know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013101_MSG0060
rows.name:
I thought Bernat and Ryo were all I'd ever need,
but it might be time to add Rock to my crack team
of elite subordinates.[ST:wait ]
